name: Twirl Dress
description: A fun and flowy dress with a full skirt, perfect for twirling and playing. Available in a variety of colors and prints.

name: A-Line Dress
description: A comfortable and flattering dress with a fitted bodice and skirt that flows out gently towards the hem. Available in various lengths and materials.

name: Sundress
description: A lightweight and sleeveless dress, perfect for warm weather. Often made from cotton or a cotton blend for breathability.

name: Party Dress
description: A special occasion dress with embellishments or brighter colors. Can be made from various materials like tulle, satin, or sequined fabrics.

name: Knit Dress
description: A comfortable and versatile dress made from a soft and stretchy knit fabric. Great for everyday wear or layering.

name: Lase Dress - Dark Pink
description: A dress with long sleeves, perfect for cooler weather. Available in various styles and thicknesses for different climates.
